original_title: Minor Tremor Reported in Trincomalee’s Gomarankadawala Area: Geological Survey and Mines Bureau
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A magnitude 3 minor tremor was reported on Sunday morning in the Gomarankadawala area in Trincomalee, according to the Geological Survey and Mines Bureau. The Bureau has stated that no damage has been reported from the area so far.
